title.rendered: Putney teacher not struck-off after carrying 'distressed' pupil

content.rendered: Teaching misconduct panel finds that striking Jill Turetsky off would not be in the public interest.

excerpt.rendered: Teaching misconduct panel finds that striking Jill Turetsky off would not be in the public interest.
